title: Neopulse Manager
description: This is a full-stack web platform that I worked on with one other developer for non-technical users to upload training data, customize parameters and train ML models using the company's ML API. It was built with a React-based frontend with drag-and-drop UI, using Websockets, internationalization (I18next), and remote deployment via SSH (AWS). ChartJS for visualization of the model iterations and results as they were trained and fetched. Node.js/ Express backend with services for api integration and chunked data transfer, dataset management, emails, authentication and session management.

title: Journey
description: The last non-private project that I worked on, with 2 other developers, was a full-stack web platform for users to collaboratively create and share their travel itineraries, Google Docs style. I migrated the build system from Create React App to Vite, upgraded 4-year-old dependencies, replaced a deprecated API with OpenTripMap, refactored all backend calls, and deployed both frontend and backend to Render, solving an unexpected cross-site CORS issue.
